mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member VALUES(#{id}, #{nick}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{profile, jdbcType=integer}, #{point, jdbcType=integer}, #{joined_date, jdbcType=datetime}, #{personal_num, jdbcType=varchar}, #{account_name, jdbcType=varchar}, #{account_num, jdbcType=varchar})
